short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimalist new tab page customizable by you (including weather provided by Dark Sky)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A minimalist new tab page with customizable links/bookmarks with a similar feel as Workflowy.

Updates:
* 1.0.10 - Major performance update regarding storage use
* 1.0.9 - Minor UI updates
* 1.0.8 - Major update to the UX (Tab, Shift+Tab, Enter, and Arrow keys now work more intuitively)
* 1.0.7 - Bug fixes
* 1.0.6 - Better "Enter" support for adding new lines after current node
* 1.0.5 - Bug fixes
* 1.0.4 - Automatic GEO location for weather; Some default links
* 1.0.3 - Supporting "chrome://" links like chrome://bookmarks and chrome://history
* 1.0.2 - Fixing Permissions Issue
* 1.0.1 - Bug fixes
